name: Grove flowers
description:
This game is similar in style to the Arcanoid. In this game, you are given the opportunity to control the platform and the fir-tree cone. Your task is to destroy all the blocks and prevent the fir cone from falling beyond the specified limits. You will receive points by collecting flowers, fish and even cats, which will fall out after destroy blocks. In the process of passing the levels, the game will create more and more difficult and long conditions for passing the level.

The gameplay of the game is very simple and filled with the sounds of nature, and the atmosphere of the game will lift your mood. This is not an epic game, but it is made for those who want a positive atmosphere.

Special features
  • 30 levels
  • 50 Diverse Blocks
  • Bonuses
  • Strange gameplay
  • Gamepad
